attributes.action: Force all bus and train/public transport companies to allow free travel to under 18s currently in education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone under eighteen is not obligated, by law, to have a job. Therefore, they do not necessarily have the income to travel anywhere. If an under 18 requres transport and is in education they should recieve free transport anywhere in the country, not just in London.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
